name: Extreme Sports Camera - All Metal Hercules Edition
description:
At a Glance...

    * Extreme Sports Camera
    * Built-in microphone
    * All aluminum casing
    * Tough rugged design
    * Records at 720x480 resolution
    * Captures 1280x1024 JPEG Photos
    * Records AVI Video at 25 frames per second
    * Supports TF card or Micro SD card up to 8 GB(not including)
    * Great for all types of action sports such as two or four wheel vehicle racing, skiing, biking, rock climbing, paintballing and skydiving.


Manufacturer Specifications

    * Primary Function: Digital Video Recorder
    * Sensor: 1/4 Inch CMOS 3MP
    * Shutter Speed: 1/8 - 1/5000 second (auto)
    * Power: Built-in Li-ion 490mAH
    * Memory: TF card or Micro SD card (8 GB max) - not included
    * Water-Resistant: YES
    * Loop Recording Function: No
    * Frames Per Second (FPS): 25
    * 4-6 hours to fully charge
    * Up to 2 hours recording time per charge
    * Recording Size: 30 MB / minute
    * Timestamp always ON
    * Video Capture Resolution: 720x480
    * Photo Resolution:1280x1024
    * Buttons:
      - Power ON/OFF
      - Record/Pause Button
    * Interface: USB port
    * Dimensions (mm): 89 (L) 28 (H)
    * Manufacturer Ref: PP84K3ME0FPZ


Product Notes

    * This is designed to strap onto most sports helmets (helmet not included)
    * This is product does not record in a loop. Meaning when the SD card is full it does not start recording again from the beginning
    * Securely attaches to flat surfaces using suction mount


Package Contents for Model CVLS-DV20

    * Extreme Sports Camera All-Metal Hercules Edition
    * Fastening strap with mounting brackets
    * USB to mini-USB cable
    * Suction mount assembly
    * Instruction Manual - English
    * Detachable viewfinder
    * DC 12V-24V power supply
    * Software driver CD

name: Sumixe - Google Android 2.1 Tablet with 7 Inch Multi-Touch Screen (WiFi, HDMI, Camera
description:
At a Glance...

    * Android 2.1 Tablet
    * 7 Inch Multi-Touch Touchscreen
    * 720MHz processor, 256MB RAM
    * 4GB internal memory
    * Ultra-thin form factor
    * WiFi
    * HDMI
    * Front facing camera
    * Built-in mic and speaker
    * Google Android Marketplace lets you download tons of third-party apps and games!

Manufacturer Specifications

    * Primary Function: Android Internet Tablet
    * Screen: 7 Inch Touchscreen LCD
    * Screen Type: Resistive, Multi-Touch
    * Screen Resolution: 800x480
    * CPU Processor Speed: Telechips 8900 ARM11 (720MHz)
    * Memory/RAM: 256MB DDR
    * Internal Memory/ROM: 4GB
    * External Memory: Micro SD Card up to 32GB (Not included)
    * USB Flash Drive Support: Yes, up to 16GB
    * Battery Type: Polymer Lithium-ion battery (7.4 V)
    * Battery Capacity: 1800 mAh (4 hours of use)
    * Speaker: Built-in 2W
    * Earphone Slot: Yes, 3.5mm
    * Mic: Built-in high sensitivity mic
    * HDMI: Yes
    * Camera: Yes, 0.3MP front facing
    * Wireless Interface: WiFi IEEE 802.11 b/g network
    * Software
      Operating System: Android 2.1 (Eclair)
      Official Google Marketplace: Yes
      Browser: Google Browser
      Pictures: JPG, BMP, PNG, GIF
      Audio: WWMA, MP3, WAV, AAC
      Video: AVI, MKV(XVID/px/H.264), MOV, TS, M2TS, RM/RMVB, FLV, WMV, 3GP, MPEG, DAT (Many more can be supported by third-party software)
      Support: Office Word, Excel, PPT
      Reader: TXT, PDF
      Email: Yes
      GPS: No
      Languages: English (UK), English (US), German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Greek, Russian, Korean, Chinese (Simp), Chinese (Trad), Japanese
    * Dimensions(L*W*D): 197mm * 115mm * 13mm



Product Notes

    * Download your favorite apps through the Android Marketplace!
    * Browse the internet for free with WiFi!
    * Use HDMI out to connect to your television for a large screen display!
    * Capture your favorite expressions with the front facing camera!
    * This Android device only supports text chatting, not voice calls
    * Note: The Android OS version on this device cannot be upgraded or flashed and any attempts to modify the default OS will void the warranty. 



Package Contents

    * Sumixe Android Tablet
    * HDMI Cable
    * USB Host Cable
    * USB Cable
    * Power Adapter
    * User Manual - English
    * Free Travel Adapter (for UK, AU, NA, SA customers)

name: Iphone 4 Solar Charger
description:
The best portable power solution for your iPhone 4 is now here! This iPhone 4 Solar Battery Charger + Holder (2400mAh) means more power and many more hours surfing the net, downloading apps, listening to music, watching videos, chatting with friends and playing games.

This clean, green, eco-friendly solar gadget comes with a high capacity 2400 mAh built-in battery that stores power from daylight or sun light. Power up your iPhone 4 while on the beach, camping, or traveling anywhere.

In addition to charging your iPhone 4, this solar iPhone charger also comes with a 5V USB output port. This handy feature enables you to charge other cellphones, media player, MP3/MP4 players, GPS units, your PSP and more.

Using this iPhone 4 Solar Battery Charger + Holder couldn't be easier. Before you head out, just charge it up by connecting the iPhone solar charger to your PC using the included USB cable. Then, simply slide your iPhone 4 inside for an extra power source which automatically recharges itself with solar power throughout the day!

This iPhone 4 accessory is an extremely convenient new eco-friendly iPhone gadget that gives you the freedom of charging your iPhone and other electronic gadgets with ease no matter where you are. You can even charge your iPhone 4 by placing the iPhone 4 Solar Battery Charger + Holder on your dash board while you're driving.

At a Glance...

    * High Capacity iPhone 4 Solar Charger and Holder
    * LED Indication for charging and battery level
    * Also compatible with iPhone 3G, 3GS
    * 5V USB output for charging MP3/MP4 players and other      phones
    * Durable, yet lightweight and slim 

Manufacturer Specifications

    * Color: Black
    * Material: Hard Molded ABS
    * Internal Battery Capacity: 2400mAh, 3.7V
    * Rated Input: Mini USB 5V/0.8A
    * Rated Output: USB 5V/0.5A
    * Charging time:
      Charging built-in battery via USB cable: 3 hours
      Charging built-in battery via solar power: 30 hours
    * Output: USB
    * Input: Mini USB
    * Dimensions:
      - Overall - L:133 x W:67 x 20 (mm)
      - Solar Panel - L:98 x W:46 (mm)

Product Notes

    * Easy to carry around
    * Clean, green, eco-friendly gadget
    * Great for emergencies
    * Never run out of power again, enjoy your iPhone 4 without worrying about battery level
    * The "iPhone" is a trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
    * This is not claimed to be an authorized or branded product by Apple Inc., although it is compatible. This product and our company are not affiliated with Apple Inc. or endorsed by them in any way.

Package Contents

    * iPhone 4 Solar Battery Charger + Holder (2400mAh)
    * USB to Mini USB Cable
    * User Manual - English
